en: The Nuclear Science Center was completed in 1961. The reactor in this facility was first taken critical on December 18, 1961.
Construction of the Texas A&M University Nuclear Science Center began in January 1959. The Triga Mark I reactor at the center first reached criticality on January 1, 1962.
The Nuclear Science Center was completed in 1961. The reactor in this facility was first taken critical on December 18, 1961.

seo.title: Nuclear Science Center - Building History
